mean_en: a statement that something will happen in the future, especially one made by somebody with religious or magic powers; the power of being able to say what will happen in the future
sentence: The prophecy said that the world would end in 2012.
sentence_trans: 预言书上说世界将在2012年毁灭。
word_etyma: prophec=prophet预言 + y表名词 → prophecy预言，预言能力
